text: I'm looking for a seafood restaurant in Cambridge. What are my options?

You're in luck! I've got just the place for you. Gourmet Fusion on the Quayside is a great seafood spot in the heart of the city. They offer a wide range of fresh seafood dishes at moderate prices. Would you like to make a reservation? Your reservation number would be 1234. Would you like to reserve a table?
I'd like to know the phone number of Gourmet Fusion so I can confirm the reservation and ask about the price range.
The phone number for Gourmet Fusion is 4223313617. You can give them a call to confirm your reservation (1234) and ask about their menu and prices.
What's the price range for a meal at Gourmet Fusion?
The price range for a meal at Gourmet Fusion is moderate.

That's helpful to know. 

Thank you for your help! Goodbye!

END
It was my pleasure to assist you. Have a great day and enjoy your meal at Gourmet Fusion! Goodbye!
